text: Musrikaharuko kunai sandhiko jim'mevari allaha ra tyasako rasulamathi kasari bamki rahanasakcha? Tara uniharuko kura yasabata alaggai cha, jasale timisita masjide haramako (ka'abako) samipama gareka thi'e, jabasam'ma uniharu timisita sandhiko nirvaha gardachan, timi pani uniharusita nirvaha gara. Niscaya nai allaha satyanisthaharula'i prema gardacha
